Jelly Boilerplate.description: A default template for a Jelly

body: cropImage(image: $0, position: $1, height: $2, width: $3, x: $4, y: $5)
cropImage.description: Crops an Image to the specified parameters.

splitText.description: Splits the text by a separator. If the separator is set to Custom you can add a customSeparator to split by any character you want.

toggleOrientationLock.description: Toggles the state of the devices Orientation Lock.

formatNumber.description: Formats a number to the given decimal places.

convertImage.description: Converts an image to a new format.

openShortcut.description: Opens the shortcut editor to the specified Shortcut.

scanQR.description: Scans a QR code and returns the output.

stockQuote.description: Gets a quote for the provided stock symbol.

valueFor.description: Get's the value for a certain key in a dictionary.

importShortcut.description: Import a shortcut into Jellycuts. Action for Jellycuts.

getEmailFrom.description: Gets emails from the given input.

matchText.description: Matches text in the input based on regex.

filterReminders.description: Filters the given reminders. Placing All Reminders in the input will allow you to filter all of your reminders.

randomNumber.description: Get's a random number between the provided max and min.

replaceText.description: Replaces text based on the parameters.

text.description: Declares text. Basically just a string.

setBrightness.description: Sets the devices bluetooth to the given double.

saveFile.description: Saves a file to a certain path. Can also show a save prompt if ask is true.

appearanceDetail.description: Gets a detail about the given device Appearance.

pageDetail.description: Gets a detail about the given Apple Pages Document.

body: addFrameToGIF(photo: $0, gif: $1, delay: $2, autoSize: $3, width: $4, height: $5)
addFrameToGIF.description: Adds the given photo to a GIF as a frame.

body: makeGIF(content: $0, frameTime: $1, loopOn: $2, loopCount: $3, autoSize: $4, width: $5, height: $6)
makeGIF.description: Creates a GIF from the provided input.

translateText.description: Translates the given text from one language to another.

getFileOfType.description: Retrieves a file of the provided type from the given input..

selectPhone.description: Allows you to select a phone number.

fileDetail.description: Retrieves a detail about a file.

resizeImage.description: Resizes an image to a certain height and width.

podcastDetail.description: Gets a detail about the given Podcast show. Checkout Launched it's a super good show.

keysFrom.description: Get all of the keys from a dictionary.

richTextFromHTML.description: Creates Rich Text from provided HTML.

openIn.description: Opens input in a certain ask.

getLastLivePhoto.description: Retrieves the last n live photos you took.

filterPhotos.description: Filters the given notes. Placing All Photos in the input will allow you to filter all of your photos.

createPlaylist.description: Creates a playlist with the given music, name, author and description.

getFile.description: Retrieves the file at a given path. It can also open a document picker if there is no path provided and the picker parameter is set to true.

getUpcomingReminders.description: Retrieves the upcoming reminders from the given list. All Lists will get reminders from all lists.

body: downloadURL(url: $0, method: $1, headers: $2, requestType: $3, requestJSON: $4, requestVar: $5)
downloadURL.description: Downloads the contents at the given URL. When making a form or JSON request, use the request JSON parameter. When using a file request type, use the request variable parameter.

setWiFi.description: Sets the state of the devices WiFi connection.

decodeURL.description: Converts URL encoded text to normal characters.

encodeURL.description: Encodes the given text in URL allowed characters.

attendeeDetail.description: Gets a detail about the given event attendee.

artistDetail.description: Gets a detail about the iTunes artist.

playSound.description: Play's the sound from the given input.

getForecast.description: Retrieves the forecast in your local area.

searchPodcasts.description: Search Apple Podcasts based on the given search terms.

addToPlaylist.description: Adds the provided music to the provided playlist.

contentGraph.description: Displays a content graph of variable.

saveToCameraRoll.description: Saves the given image to the camera roll.

contactDetail.description: Gets a detail about the given contact.

deviceDetails.description: Retrieves a detail about the device.

askForInput.description: Asks the user for input input.

body: encodeMedia(media: $0, size: $1, speed: $2, customSpeed: $3, title: $4, artist: $5, album: $6, genre: $7, year: $8, artwork: $9)
encodeMedia.description: Encodes the given media into a video.

setDND.description: Sets the devices Do Not Disturb to the given boolean.

removeEvents.description: Removes the given events from the calendar.

filterContacts.description: Filters the given contacts. Placing All Contacts in the input will allow you to filter all of your contacts.

getDictionaryFrom.description: Gets a dictionary from the given input.

setOrientationLock.description: Sets the state of the devices Orientation Lock.

getDateFrom.description: Gets the dates from the given input.

wifiDetails.description: Gets a detail about the devices WiFi.

sendMessage.description: Sends a message to a recipient.

getFrames.description: Get's all the frames from the given media.

adjustDate.description: Adjusts the given date by adding or subtracting the given duration. If you use any get operation you do not need a duration.

videoFromGif.description: Creates a video from a GIF. It's pronounced GIF

getNumbersFrom.description: Detects the numbers in the given input.

createPDF.description: Creates a pdf from the provided input.

podcastEpisodeDetail.description: Gets a detail about the given Podcast episode. Checkout ATP btw it's a super good show.

body: overlayImage(image1: $0, image2: $1, editor: $2, height: $3, width: $4, position: $5, opacity: $6, rotation: $7)
overlayImage.description: Overlays one image onto another image.

stockDetail.description: Gets a detail about the given stock.

selectSong.description: Allows you to select a song from Apple Music.

selectPhoto.description: Allows you to select a photo.

noteDetail.description: Gets a detail about the note.

htmlFromRichText.description: Creates an HTML document from the provided Rich Text.

grabJellycut.description: Get's the plist from the latest exported Jellycut.

setFlashlight.description: Sets the flashlight state and brightness.

filterMusic.description: Filters the given music. Placing All Music in the input will allow you to filter all of your music.

wait.description: Waits a specified amount of seconds.

setValue.description: Sets a key's value in a dictionary.

removeFromAlbum.description: Removes an image from an album.

math.description: Solves a math equation. You can use +, -, ×, ÷, and … as operations. When using … you can apply a scientific operation type.

getClass.description: Gets an object with the defined class.

conditionDetail.description: Gets a detail about the given condition.

subscribeToPodcast.description: Subscribes to the Podcast at the given feed url in Apple Podcasts.

appDetail.description: Gets a detail about the given app.

formatSize.description: Formats the size of a file.

getTimeBetween.description: Retrieves the time between the two dates.

selectedEmail.description: Allows you to select a contact's email.

filterNotes.description: Filters the given notes. Placing All Notes in the input will allow you to filter all of your notes.

setCellular.description: Sets the state of the devices cellular connection.

getTextFrom.description: Gets the text from the given input.

shazamDetail.description: Gets a detail about the given Shazam.

getLastVideo.description: Retrieves the last n videos you recorded.

getShortcuts.description: Retrieves a list of all of your shortcuts.

lowPowerMode.description: Sets the devices low power mode.

getPodcastEpisodes.description: Retreives the episodes from a podcast.

showInCalendar.description: Shows the provided event on the calendar.

shortcutDetail.description: Gets a detail about a Shortcut.

continueInShortcuts.description: Makes the shortcut continue in the Shortcuts app.

setVoiceData.description: Set's the devices cellular data settings. Can be used to change the current sim, and cell mode (4G, LTE, 5G).

filterAttendees.description: Filters the given Attendees. Attendees are people attending an event.

getRSSItems.description: Gets the RSS items from an RSS Feed.

appendNote.description: Appends text to the end of a note.

waitToReturn.description: Waits for you to return back to the app to continue execution.

setBluetooth.description: Sets the devices bluetooth to the given boolean.

filterCalendar.description: Filters the given events. Placing All Events in the input will allow you to filter all of your calendar events.

userActivity.description: This is just a blank action that does not do anything.

recordAudio.description: Records audio with the given parameters.

runJavascriptOnWebpage.description: Runs the given javascript on a webpage.

skipBack.description: Skips backwards in the current media queue.

getAddressFrom.description: Gets addresses from the given input.

eventDetail.description: Gets a detail about the given event.

articleDetail.description: Gets a detail about the given article.

urlContents.description: Retrieves the contents of a url. Returns a webpage.

siriDonation.description: This is just a blank action that does not do anything.

addToReadingList.description: Adds a URL to your reading list.

getArticle.description: Retrieves an article using safari reader.

correctSpelling.description: Corrects the spelling of a word or sentence. Words can be placed in an array.

body: encodeAudio(media: $0, format: $1, speed: $2, customSpeed: $3, title: $4, artist: $5, album: $6, genre: $7, year: $8, artwork: $9)

count.description: Counts different things within the given input.

searchItunes.description: Searches iTunes based of the parameters you provide..

getLastScreenshot.description: Retrieves the last n screenshots you took.

takeScreenshot.description: Takes a screenshot of the devices current screen.

sampleDetail.description: Gets a detail about the given health sample.

searchAppStore.description: Searches the app store using the given parameters.

setMediaDestination.description: Sets the playback destination of the current media.

addUpNext.description: Adds the provided music to the up next queue.

startWorkout.description: Starts a workout. The value parameter is the amount of whatever unit you place. For example 200 cal, 10 min, or 1 hr

getFileLink.description: Gets the iCloud link to a certain file.

combineText.description: Combines the given text. Text can be given in an array.

getMatchGroup.description: Gets the a certain group in a regex match.

detectLanguage.description: Detects the language of the given text.

play.description: Plays or pauses the current music.

openApp.description: Opens an app on the device.

productDetail.description: Gets a detail about the given product.

emojiName.description: Retrieves the name of the Emoji.

setName.description: Sets the name of an item.

rotateImage.description: Rotates an image a certain degree.

playPodcast.description: Subscribes to the Podcast at the given feed url in Apple Podcasts.

encode.description: Encodes the given input into base64 without line breaks.

getContactsFrom.description: Gets contacts from the given input.

getPhonesFrom.description: Gets phone numbers from the given input.

getLastImport.description: Retrieves the last photo you imported.

showWebPage.description: Shows a webpage at the given URLS.

getLastPhoto.description: Retrieves the last n photos in your library. You can optionally include screenshots or not.

selectContact.description: Allows you to select a contact.

createQR.description: Creates a QR for the given text.

skipForward.description: Skips forward in the current media queue.

reminderDetail.description: Gets a detail about the given reminder.

cellularDetails.description: Gets a detail about the devices Cellular Connection.

getType.description: Get's the type of the given input.

setClipboard.description: Sets the devices clipboard to the input.

createNote.description: Creates a note with the given input.

appendFile.description: Appends contents to the end of a file.

getName.description: Get's the name of the given input.

round.description: Rounds a number depending on the parameters.

imageDetail.description: Gets a detail about the given image.

uploadPhotos.description: Uploads the given photos to the shared photos album.

timer.description: Starts a timer for the given time.

showDefinition.description: Gets the definition of a word.

body: runSSH(host: $0, port: $1, user: $2, auth: $3, password: $4, input: $5, script: $6)
runSSH.description: Runs the given script over an SSH connection.

getImagesFrom.description: Gets Images from the given input.

choose.description: Allows you to choose an item from the given list.

showInStore.description: Shows the provided product in the store.

getItemFromList.description: Gets an item from the given list. If you choose to get items in range you can use the startIndex and endIndex to define the range, you do not need to give it an index.

body: xCallbackURL(url: $0, custom: $1, success: $2, cancel: $3, error: $4, customXSuccess: $5, xSuccess: $6)

makeArchive.description: Makes an archive of the given file.

locationDetail.description: Gets a detail about the given location.

setAppearance.description: Sets the devices appearance to the given style.

exit.description: Exits the shortcut. This works like a return function basically. You can return a value if you place a variable in the parameters.

valuesFrom.description: Get all of the values from a dictionary.

getHeaders.description: Retrieves the headers at a certain URL.

dictionary.description: Creates a dictionary based on the given JSON. JSON can be replaced with a dictionary from the dictionary builder.

markdownFromRich.description: Makes markdown from the given rich text.

getLastBurst.description: Retrieves the last n bursts you took.

musicDetail.description: Gets a detail about the given song.

logWorkout.description: Logs a workout to the health app.

getPodcasts.description: Retreives all the podcasts in your library.
